name: uhooks
description: micro hooks: a minimalistic client/server hooks' implementation

scripts.build: npm run cjs && npm run rollup:babel && npm run rollup:dom && npm run rollup:es && npm run rollup:esdom && npm run min && npm run test && npm run size
scripts.rollup:babel: rollup --config rollup/babel.config.js && sed -i.bck 's/^var /self./' index.js && rm -rf index.js.bck
scripts.rollup:dom: rollup --config rollup/babel.dom.config.js && sed -i.bck 's/^var /self./' dom.js && rm -rf dom.js.bck
scripts.rollup:es: rollup --config rollup/es.config.js && sed -i.bck 's/^var /self./' es.js && rm -rf es.js.bck
scripts.rollup:esdom: rollup --config rollup/es.dom.config.js && sed -i.bck 's/^var /self./' dom.js && rm -rf dom.js.bck
scripts.size: cat dom.js | brotli | wc -c && cat esdom.js | brotli | wc -c && cat min.js | brotli | wc -c && cat es.js | brotli | wc -c

author: Andrea Giammarchi
